short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visits BarkingMad.co.za daily, and clicks the 'Click to Feed' button on your behalf. Contributing half a bowl of food per day!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the "BarkingMad Autofeeder" Chrome Extension â€“ Your Daily Solution to Feed Hungry Dogs!

Do you support BarkingMad's incredible mission to provide a daily bowl of food to hungry dogs? Now you can effortlessly contribute to this noble cause with my Chrome extension. Say goodbye to missed opportunities to help because this extension automates your daily contributions for you, making sure no hungry pup goes unfed.

Why you should use my extension:

Seamless Contributions: Never worry about forgetting to visit the website and click the button again. The extension handles the daily contributions, ensuring you make a real impact without lifting a finger.

Track Your Impact: With the extension, you can easily monitor and celebrate your contributions. Watch the number of bowls of food you've donated grow over time, knowing you're making a tangible difference.

Feel-Good Notifications: Stay motivated and inspired with optional notifications. Each time you contribute another bowl, receive a notification that reinforces your commitment to these hungry dogs.

Join me in supporting BarkingMad's mission to provide meals for those in need. Together, we can make a significant difference in the lives of countless hungry dogs. Visit BarkingMad at https://barkingmad.co.za/ and install the extension today to start making a difference!


** Not affiliated with BarkingMad.co.za **
